Hi Paul.
You are correct. Re the driveshafts they are standard driveshafts from a type 3 or type 2 from a 3 rib and up gearbox. Re the flexiplate you will have to search for either new or used. Im not sure if a type 25 could be altered or not. You will need to research. The gearbox has not been overhauled there is no warranty. I can get the box overhauled with a receipt and warranty circa £300. I myself recently bought a 6 rib manual box for £800 and spent another £300 on a rebuild myself.
I hope ive answered ll your questions.
Regards
Darren
The drive shafts are not, they are specific to a Auto Box. they are offset so different lengths that is why you had spacers

Ahhh yes though the spacers can be made to suit your individual application. I very much doubt the driveshafts are offset !!! They may be different lengths. Do you know where there is a set available as they would be very handy.
